text: Bettmannsäge is a village in Regen in the Bavarian Forest region of Germany. == Geography == Bettmannsäge is between Zwiesel and Regen on the railway line from Plattling to Bayerisch Eisenstein, the Bavarian Forest Railway. == History == Bettmannsäge used to belong to the municipality of Rinchnachmündt and was incorporated with it as part of the municipal reforms on 1 May 1978 into Regen. == References == ==Literature== * Horst Sauer: Die Orte Schweinhütt, Bettmannsäge, Dreieck und Tausendbach: Ein kulturgeschichtliches Tagebuch in Berichten und Bildern. Agentur SSL, Grafenau, 2004. . * Walther Zeitler: Die bayerische Waldbahn. Passau, 1991, . Category:Villages in Bavaria Category:Regen (district)
title: Bettmannsäge
